# PKPaymentSummaryItemType.pending

**Case**

A summary item that represents an estimated or unknown cost.

## Declaration

```swift
case pending
```

## Payment summary item types

- **PKPaymentSummaryItemType.final**: A summary item that represents a known, final cost.

items.description: A summary item that represents a known, final cost.
items.name: PKPaymentSummaryItemType.final

title: PKPaymentSummaryItemType.pending
